description:
She is the survivor of the Great Catalysm whom http://anidb.net/character/106654 [Yona] found after she awakened as the First Pillar and had her sealed in within the Amaterasu reactor to serve as a means to restart civilization to arrange a second Great Catalysm. The centuries-long isolation made Amaterasu resentful towards mankind. 
The collective subconscious eventually created her Doppelg√§nger http://anidb.net/character/102504 [Iris], influencing http://anidb.net/character/102514 [Shinra] at times to give into his own resentment. After the second Great Catalysm is prevented after being sacrificed for it, Amaterasu decided to remain dead so Iris can live a full life in her stead.
name: Amaterasu
